Module frogger
Package frogger.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
frogger.controller.GameController
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
Controls behaviours and handles events on the Game view.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initialises the game view.

    • keyPressed

      public void keyPressed​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Handles key-pressed events on the game view. This includes a part of movement controls of the frog, the pausing or muting of the game, and the activation of the easter egg.
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - the key-pressed event.

    • keyReleased

      public void keyReleased()
      Handles key-released events on the game view. This includes a part of movement controls of the frog.

    • createTimer

      private void createTimer()
      Creates the timer for checking events consecutively. The events include the action of all elements, the check of frog conditions, the addition of random elements, the completion of a level, and the ending of the game.

    • startGame

      private void startGame()
      Starts the game.

    • pauseGame

      private void pauseGame()
      Pauses the game.

    • resumeGame

      private void resumeGame()
      Resumes the game.

    • stopGame

      private void stopGame()
      Stops the game. Checks for high scores and switches to the respective view on demand.

    • deathReset

      private void deathReset()
      Resets death associated data.

    • goalReset

      private void goalReset()
      Resets goal associated data.

    • setLivesNumber

      private void setLivesNumber​(int lives)
      Displays the number of lives with corresponding number of pictures.
      Parameters:
      lives - the number of lives to be set as an integer.

    • setScoreNumber

      private void setScoreNumber​(int score)
      Displays the score with pictures.
      Parameters:
      score - the score to be set as an integer.

    • levelUp

      private void levelUp()
      Handles the level up. This includes the reset of slots, the speeding up of moving elements, the introduction of challenging elements and the display of message.

    • toggleEasterEgg

      private void toggleEasterEgg()
      Toggles the easter egg on or off.
